Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
shop.pos.dao.DatabaseConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
Employee, Ingredient, Inventory, Manager, Menu, MenuItem, Order, Staff
public class DatabaseConnection extends Object
Base class for database operations that provides connection management and common database query execution methods. This class handles database connection setup with manual credential input and provides utility methods for executing SQL queries and updates.
Author:
Michael Nguyen

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static Connection
    connection
    Singleton database connection instance shared across all DAO objects

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DatabaseConnection()
    Constructs a new DatabaseConnection and establishes a database connection by reading credentials from the .env file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected static List<Map<String,Object>>
    executeQuery(String query)
    Executes an SQL SELECT query on the database and returns the result as a list of mapped values.
    protected static int
    executeUpdate(String query)
    Executes an SQL update statement (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE) on the database and returns the number of rows affected by the operation.

    getConnection()
    Gets the current database connection.
    private static List<Map<String,Object>>
    resultSetToList(ResultSet rs)
    Converts a ResultSet to a list of mapped values where each row is represented as a Map with column names as keys and column values as values.

  • Field Details

    • connection

      private static Connection connection
      Singleton database connection instance shared across all DAO objects

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseConnection

      public DatabaseConnection()
      Constructs a new DatabaseConnection and establishes a database connection by reading credentials from the .env file. If a connection already exists, this constructor will reuse the existing connection.

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection()
      Gets the current database connection.
      Returns:
      the database connection

    • resultSetToList

      private static List<Map<String,Object>> resultSetToList(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Converts a ResultSet to a list of mapped values where each row is represented as a Map with column names as keys and column values as values.
      Parameters:
      rs - the ResultSet to convert
      Returns:
      a list of maps representing the ResultSet data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • executeQuery

      protected static List<Map<String,Object>> executeQuery(String query)
      Executes an SQL SELECT query on the database and returns the result as a list of mapped values. Each row in the result is represented as a Map with column names as keys and column values as values.
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL SELECT query to execute
      Returns:
      a list of maps representing the query results, or null if an error occurs

    • executeUpdate

      protected static int executeUpdate(String query)
      Executes an SQL update statement (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE) on the database and returns the number of rows affected by the operation.
      Parameters:
      query - the SQL update query to execute
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected, or -1 if the operation failed
